reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Contribute to the reduction of tuberculosis-related morbidity and mortality in Madagascar, according to the End TB strategy and Sustainable Development Goals

description.narrative: Madagascar - Tuberculosis - Catholic Relief Services - United States Conference of Catholic Bishops - CRS HQ. This program has the following goals: Réduire le taux d'incidence de la tuberculose de 50 % à l’horizon 2025 par rapport à l’année 2018/Reducing the incidence rate of tuberculosis by 50% by 2025 compared to 2018. Réduire le taux de mortalité due à la tuberculose de 75% à l'horizon 2025 par rapport à l'année 2018/Reducing the mortality rate due to tuberculosis by 75% by 2025 compared to 2018. The objectives of this program are: Accroître la couverture de traitement des nouveaux cas et rechutes en passant de 55% en 2018 à 90% en 2024/Increasing treatment coverage for new cases and relapses from 55% in 2018 to 90% in 2024. Traiter 100% des patients TB diagnostiqués et accroître le taux de succès thérapeutique à au moins 90% pour la TB sensible d'ici 2024/Treating 100% of diagnosed TB patients and increasing the therapeutic success rate to at least 90% for susceptible TB by 2024. Traiter 100% des patients TB-RR/MR diagnostiqués et accroître le taux de succès thérapeutique à au moins 75% pour la TB-MR jusqu’en 2024/Treating 100% of diagnosed RR-MDR / MDR patients and increasing the therapeutic success rate to at least 75% for MDR-TB until 2024. Assurer la prévention à au moins 90% des enfants contacts et des PvVIH après exclusion de la TB maladie d’ici 2024/Ensuring prevention for at least 90% of contact children and PLHIV after exclusion of TB disease by 2024. Assurer le dépistage VIH et la prise en charge ARV à 100% des patients TB notifiés à partir de 2021/Ensuring HIV testing and ARV care for 100% of TB patients notified from 2021. Assurer une meilleure gestion du Programme à tous les niveaux (suivi et évaluation, collecte et exploitation des données pour la planification)/Ensuring better management of the Program at all levels (monitoring and evaluation, collection and use of data for planning)

description.narrative: Living support to client/ target population (LSCTP)

title.narrative: Number of cases with RR-TB and/or MDR-TB that began second-line treatment

Percentage of laboratories showing adequate performance in external quality assurance for smear microscopy among the total number of laboratories that undertake smear microscopy during the reporting period
Number of notified TB cases (all forms) contributed by non-national TB program providers – community referrals
Treatment success rate of RR TB and/or MDR-TB: Percentage of cases with RR and/or MDR-TB successfully treated
Percentage of HIV-positive new and relapse TB patients on ART during TB treatment
Percentage of health facilities with tracer medicines for the three diseases available on the day of the visit or day of reporting
Number of notified cases of all forms of TB (i.e. bacteriologically confirmed + clinically diagnosed), new and relapse cases
Percentage of registered new and relapse TB patients with documented HIV status

Treatment success rate- all forms: Percentage of TB cases, all forms, bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed, successfully treated (cured plus treatment completed) among all TB cases registered for treatment during a specified period, new and relapse cases
Timeliness of facility reporting: Percentage of submitted facility monthly reports (for the reporting period) that are received on time per the national guidelines
Number of people in contact with TB patients who began preventive therapy
Percentage of new and relapse TB patients tested using WHO recommended rapid tests at the time of diagnosis
Completeness of facility reporting: Percentage of expected facility monthly reports (for the reporting period) that are actually received
